name: Lavish
description:
THE GAME IS IN PROTOTYPE STAGE !
Thank you for your understanding. :)

This is a Submission for the "Emotional Game Jam" 2018.
- Special "Graphics" Price @ Emotional Game Jam.

Controls :
Left & Right Arrows  =  Walk
Up Arrow  =  Jump
Spacebar  =  Open Doors/Interact

CREDITS :
- MAXIME BODEREAU (Sprites Animations, Story, Level Design)
- BENJAMIN MAGNAN (Sprites & Props)
- PAUL FINNERTY (C# - Unity)
- MAXIME LANCELOT (C# - Unity, Lighting, Music, Level Design)
